front.title: Recommended Practice for 1 to 35 kV Medium Voltage DC Power Systems on Ships

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This standard recommends guidelines to specify, procure, design, 1 manufacture and develop manuals, safety procedures, practices and procedures for effective maintenance of Medium Voltage DC (MVDC) electrical power systems. Recommendations are made for analytical methods, preferred interconnection interfaces and performance characteristics for reliable integration of MVDC Electrical components into the Ship MVDC electrical power systems.
